snippet: The cabdrivers say they are protesting soaring expenses, shrinking incomes and the competition presented by a spate of new ride-hailing apps.
abstract: Taxi drivers across China are striking to protest high expenses, dwindling incomes and additional difficulties of competing against car service apps like Uber; some newspapers have come out in support of drivers, publishing articles critical of cab companies' treatment of them.
lead_paragraph: The cabdrivers say they are protesting soaring expenses, shrinking incomes and the competition presented by a spate of new ride-hailing apps.

headline.main: Strikes by Taxi Drivers Spread Across China
headline.print_headline: Strikes by Taxi Drivers Spread Across China
